mapper.select: select * from( select list.*, rownum as rnum from ( SELECT notice_no, notice_title, notice_content, notice_writer, notice_regdate, notice_viewcnt FROM notice_tb ORDER BY notice_no desc, notice_regdate desc )list ) where rnum between #{start_row} and #{end_row}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO notice_tb ( notice_no, notice_title, notice_content, notice_writer, admin_number, notice_regdate
) VALUES ( seq_notice_tb.nextval, #{notice_title}, #{notice_content}, #{notice_writer}, #{admin_number}, sysdate )
mapper.update: UPDATE notice_tb SET notice_viewcnt = notice_viewcnt + 1 WHERE notice_no = #{notice_no}
mapper.select: select nvl(count(1),0) from (select list.* from( SELECT notice_no, notice_title, notice_content, notice_writer, notice_regdate, notice_viewcnt FROM notice_tb )list )
